ygData.subject: Guk Tricks [WAS:Re: Area Songs in Lguk [WAS:etc etc hehe
ygData.msgSnippet: I know what you mean about the crazy pulls... Was in the Savant room last night (got a BEM yay!), and our group saw all manner of things run past us.  Minos,
ygData.messageBody:
I know what you mean about the crazy pulls...
Was in the Savant room last night (got a BEM yay!), and our group saw all
manner of things run past us. Minos, huge clusters of frogs, and even an
EE! I'm not to well versed on the layout of Lower yet (getting there tho!)
but i believe it was the Cavalier group who was pulling. People like to
get a reputation as being a good puller by pulling crap from live side to
dead side. Heck, once I was grouped with a Paly (can't remember his name)
who was a damned good puller. He bragged that he once pulled something
from upper guk! lol!

Elwe Lay
36 Songs
Kinship of Valor
Karana
